channel.title: Security & Audit :: YWallet
channel.description: YWallet went through two security reviews conducted by Taylor Hornby (former ECC employee and Zcash Protocol Engineer); Least Authority. Both following grants from the Zcash Community Grants Reports The reports are available for download: Ywallet Security and Privacy Analysis ZCG Consultation Feedback Disclosure If you find a security issue, please report it to the author via email to Ywallet Email For encrypted communication, use the following AGE public key age1ys5w8jljape5nr40n4gg2zfh6a5tf4eq6xfsftlw8dmnnfeczd3q2pqgnd
